title: Ticket #1791: condor_qedit and condor_prio changes should show up in the UserLog
description: The condor_qedit and condor_prio changes do not show up in the UserLog. Modifications made to the job through the schedd's interfaces should be reflected in the UserLog. This should include any condor_qedit's and condor_prio's that modify the job.
remarks:
2010-Dec-22 10:37:33 by jfrey:
Comments on the proposed patch:

  • You should create a new user log event type, rather than use Generic type.

  • Similar to #1790, condor_qedit should have a backwards-compatibility check for SetAttributeByConstraint() with the new qmgmt call.
derived_tickets: #3219   allow condor_qedit to log, but not do it by default.
attachments:
• log_user_changes.patch 19854 bytes added by rrati on 2010-Dec-17 15:46:28 UTC.
    This patch will log user initiated changes (qedit, prio, chirp) in the user log
check_ins: 2011-Jan-13 09:21   Check-in [19934]: User initiated attribute changes from qedit, prio, and chirp are now logged in the user log (if there is one). #1791 Conflicts: src/condor_includes/condor_qmgr.h src/condor_schedd.V6/qmgmt.cpp src/condor_schedd.V6/qmgmt_constants.h src/condor_tools/qedit.cpp (By Robert Rati )
creator: rrati
